meanings.definition: People who are present at an event or gathering.
meanings.sent1: The attendees enjoyed the concert in the park.
meanings.sent2: There were many attendees at the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The attendees at the school play cheered loudly for the actors.
meanings.sent4: The attendees at the wedding brought joy and laughter to the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The attendees at the museum tour listened attentively to the guide's explanations.

meanings.definition: Those who attend or participate in a meeting or conference.
meanings.sent1: The attendees at the business meeting discussed new ideas.
meanings.sent2: The conference had attendees from various countries.
meanings.sent3: The attendees at the seminar were eager to learn from the speaker.
meanings.sent4: The attendees at the workshop shared their experiences with each other.
meanings.sent5: The attendees at the training session actively participated in the group activities.
